text: Rabobank is a prominent global financial institution that has a strong presence in the Netherlands and other countries around the world. With a history dating back to 1898, Rabobank has established itself as a reliable and customer-focused bank. It offers a wide range of financial services, including banking, insurance, and asset management, catering to individuals, businesses, and agricultural enterprises. Rabobank is known for its sustainable and socially responsible approach, actively supporting initiatives related to agriculture, food, and rural development. With its commitment to innovation and community engagement, Rabobank continues to play a vital role in the global financial landscape. As of December 2014, total assets amount to €681 billion with a net profit of €1.8 billion. Global Finance ranks Rabobank 25th in its survey of "the world's safest banks". == References == Category:Banks of Europe Category:Companies of the Netherlands Category:Utrecht (city)
title: Rabobank (company)
